dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing over 150,000 images and 310,000 freestyle Chinese question-answer pairs with their English translations, designed for training and evaluating visual question answering models.
dcterms:title: Freestyle Multilingual Image Question Answering (FM-IQA)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images with annotations for object detection and segmentation, widely used in computer vision tasks.
dcterms:title: MS COCO
